metarelation: 植物保護學會會刊 43(2): 105-115,Plant Protection Bulletin 43(2): 105-115,植物保護學會會刊,43(2):,105-115
metatitle: 橫山梨果腐病之病因及病原菌藥劑感受性測定,Fruit rot of oriental pear caused by Erwinia carotovora subsp. carotovora and in vitro bactericide screening
metasubject: 梨,果腐病,軟腐細菌,藥劑篩選,果實蠅,pear,fruit rot disease,soft rot bacterium,bactericide screening,oriental fruit fly
metadescription:
於1998 年6 月間在南投縣中寮鄉種植之橫山梨發現果實腐爛問題，經柯霍氏
法則確認該病原為細菌，隔年（1999）於新竹栽培之橫山梨亦發現相同病害。此
病害主要危害果實，在枝條及葉片上不引起病徵，果實初期病徵僅在表皮上出現
淡褐色水浸狀小斑點，病斑繼續擴展造成內部果肉腐爛，輕壓表皮具彈性，嚴重
時整個果實腐爛，並有乳白色汁液與氣泡湧出。從罹病果實上分離之細菌，經生
理生化測定，Biolog 鑑定系統，專一性引子對PCR 分析等方法，鑑定該病原細菌
為Erwinia carotovora subsp. carotovora。將此病定名為果腐病。以蟲針沾細菌懸浮
液刺傷果實及浸菌無傷口接種等方法接種橫山梨果實，發現僅傷口處理者出現病
徵，且病徵擴展迅速，病斑直徑可達1.2 cm/day，該病菌也感染新興梨，在馬鈴薯、
胡蘿蔔及洋蔥等組織上具有致腐能力，且可造成煙草植株腐爛。果實蠅媒介試驗
顯示在有果實蠅成蟲之蟲箱內，不論以病菌處理果實蠅取食之洋菜膠或以病菌直
接覆於果實上，供試之橫山梨及新興梨果實均出現典型果腐病徵。另外，讓果實
蠅於梨果實上產卵後，於產卵孔滴病原菌也產生相同果腐病徵。測試市售11 種藥
劑在一般使用濃度下對該病菌生長之抑制效果，結果顯示除鋅乃浦外，其餘供試
之枯萎寧、四環黴素、鏈黴素、安達菌、嘉賜黴素、嘉賜銅、氫氧化銅、鹼性氯
氧化銅、銅合浦及鋅錳乃浦等藥劑於培養基上均能抑制該病菌之生長。
An incidental fruit rot of oriental pears occurred in Chung Liao, Nantou in July,
1998. The causal agent attacked fruits and caused severe fruit rot. After being
attacked, fruits firstly showed water-soaked lesions, the tissues became extremely
soft, followed by a slimy decay that associated with mushy slimy white color ooze
emerging from lesions. An unknown bacterium was isolated from the diseased
fruits and followed identification based on physiological characteristcs, Biolog
analyses and primer pairs specific to Erwinia carotovora and Erwinia chrysanthemi
using polymerase chain reaction, the causal agent was therefore identified as Erwinia
carotovora subsp. carotovora (Ecc). Inoculation tests conducted in the laboratory
indicated that the expansion of the soft lesion could reach up to 1.2 cm diameter per
day. In addition to pear, the bacterium could also cause soft rot of potato, carrot,
onion and tobacco. Transmission tests combining oriental fruit flies and Ecc in a
confined space indicated that oriental fruit flies could transmit the disease through
feeding or egg laying. Screening eleven chemicals include Streptomycin +
Tetracycline, Tetacycline, Streptomycin, Thiophanate methy1 + Streptomycin,
Kasugamycin, Kasugamyucin + Copper oxychloride, Copper hydroxide, Copper
oxychloride, Copper oxychloride + Mancozeb, and Mancozeb in vitro, the results
showed that all chemicals, except Zineb, effectively inhibited bacterial growth at
various dosage tested.

metatitle: (43(4):402-411)灌水深度對芡實農藝性狀、產量及品質之影響,(43(4):402-411)Effects of Watering Depth on the Agronomic Characters, Yield, and Quality of Euryale ferox Salisbury
metasubject: 芡實,水深,農藝性狀,產量,品質,Euryale ferox Salisbury,Watering Depth,Agronomic characters,Yield,Quality
metadescription:
本研究以芡實為材料，利用四種不同灌水深度之缽植方式栽培芡實，以探討灌水深度對芡實生長習性、產量及品質之影響，及改進芡實之栽培技術。試驗結果顯示，不同灌水深度對芡實各項農藝性狀之影響很大，在不同水深中以45cm之芡實各項農藝性狀之表現較佳，其柄長、葉長、葉寬、根長、根數、與全株鮮重之表現值甚高，且有最大之全株乾重，達11g／plant。所有與產量有關之性狀如芡實鮮重與乾重、百粒重、粒長、粒寬、粒數、乾殼重及乾仁重等之表現，均會隨著灌水深度之不同而有差異，四種水深中以45及60cm之芡實各項產量性狀之表現最佳，且皆顯著優於15及30cm處理者。在芡實之一般成分含量中，粗蛋白質及灰分受不同灌水深度之影響很大，除了灰分之外，芡實在45cm水深中各項一般成分之表現甚佳，其蛋白質含量高達13.6％。而P、K、Ca、Mg及Cu之含量在不同灌水深度下，亦有顯著或極顯著之差異表現，一般以較淺之15及30cm水深中各項礦物元素含量之表現較佳，惟除了Mg之外，芡實在45cm水深中11項礦物元素含量之表現，與較淺之15或30cm水深者之差異不大，且大致皆較60cm略高。由上述兩年之試驗結果可知，45cm之灌水深度似為栽培芡實之適當水深深度。此外，由芡實農藝性狀與產量性狀間之相關分析結果得知，除葉數與百粒重呈顯著負相關外，各農藝性狀之間大致都呈正相關，即柄愈茁壯，葉愈茂盛，根愈強健，全株之鮮重也愈大；各產量性狀間亦呈顯著正相關關係，即芡實愈大粒，粒數將較多，且愈重。
The purpose of this study was to develop a proper watering cultivation method for production and quality improvement of Euryale ferox Salisbury through evaluation of four watering depths in the cultivated plastic boxes. Experimental results showed that highly significant or significant effect of different watering depths was recorded on the agronomic characters and yield traits of Euryale ferox. Among the four watering depths, plants grown in the 45cm showed a superior performance by its better characteristics, yield and higher content of crude protein and major and minor mineral elements as compared to the other treatments. It was suggested that 45cm might be the most promising watering depth for the future water cultivation of Euryale ferox. Correlation analysis showed that except the negative correlation between leaf number and the yield traits such as 100-seed weight the agronomic characters of Euryale ferox were highly correlated with its yield traits. That meaned the better development of the petiole could result in stronger growth of leaf, root and seed.

metacontributor: Department of Agronomy, Taiwan Agricultural Research Institute,Hsui-Ying Lu
metarelation: Agronomy Journal 87(5): 888-891,Agronomy Journal,5,888-891
metatitle: PC-SAS program for estimating Huhn's nonparametric stability statistics
metadescription: A program written in the SAS language for personal computers to estimate Hühn's two nonparametric stability statistics is presented. Nonparametric methods proposed by Hühn in the 1970s are based on the ranks of genotypes in each environment and use the idea of homeostasis as a measure of stability. A stable genotype shows similar rankings across environments. Nonparametric stability statistics provide a viable alternative to existing parametric measures based on absolute data. They require no statistical assumptions about the distribution of the phenotypic values and are easy to use. Addition or deletion of one or a few observations is not as likely to cause great variation in the estimates as would be the case for parametric stability measures. For many applications (e.g., selection in breeding and testing programs), the rank orders of genotypes are the most essential information. The program deals with a two-way table with K genotypes and N environments. The output contains two main features: (i) corrected values and their ranks of genotypes within each environment, and (ii) two nonparametric stability estimates and their test of significance. From the output, one may exmnine the rankings of genotypes in each environment and look for stability differences among genotypes. This program should make practical the more frequent use of nonparametric stability statistics to investigate genotype x environment interactions in agricultural research.

metarelation: 中華農業研究 43(2): 155-164,Journal of Agricultural Research of China 43(2):155-164,中華農業研究,43(2):,155-164
metatitle: (43(2):155-164)水田栽培檳榔心芋全株葉面積之估算. I. 非破壞性取樣法,(43(2):155-164)Estimation of Total Plant Leaf Area in Wetland Taro 〔Colocasia esculenta (L.) Schott〕I. Non-destructive Sampling
metasubject: 芋,全株葉面積,非破壞性取樣,預測模式,準確度,Taro,Total plant leaf area,Non-destructive sampling,Predictive model,Precision
metadescription: 本研究之主要目的在探討臺灣本地栽培種檳榔心芋於水田栽培時之全株葉面積的簡易估算方法，利用不同時期以非破壞性取樣所測量之單葉面積資料，尋找出一套精確且迅速之簡易方式來估算全株葉面積。本試驗於1991年秋作在臺灣省農業試驗所試驗田區進行，自移植日起至收穫為止，每隔21天逢機調查10株芋植株，依葉序由外向內測量各不同葉位之葉面積，以建立單葉推測全株葉面積之估算式；繼之再以1992年秋作及1993年春作於同一栽培地點所取得之芋植株逢機樣本，來檢測該估算模式在不同期作下的推測能力。結果顯示，水田栽培檳榔心芋之全株葉面積估算公式，以第3葉之面積乘以4.57，或以第4葉之面積乘以4.01，用來推測出移植後第106天時之全株葉面積的效果較好，同時所含的估算介值最少（僅有一個）。不同期作因氣候條件之變化，使得移植後第106天時的芋植株之生長發育未必相同，但比較春秋作之預測與實際全株葉面積之間的差異，其準確度均可達90％左右。,This study was made to develop an accurate, simple and rapid method for estimating total plant leaf area of wetland taro 〔Colocasia esculenta (L.) Schott〕under different growth periods in Taiwan by using nondestructive sampling. The experiment was conducted in the fall crop of 1991 at Taiwan Agricultural Research Institute (TART). A total of 10 plants was randomly sampled at 21-day intervals starting at transplanting and ending at harvest. All the leaves were serially numbered from the outer leaf. The area of each leaf were measured. Moreover, to test the predictive ability for models of total plant leaf area estimation in different crop seasons, random samples of 20 plants from the experiments in the fall crop of 1992 and spring crop of 1993 at TARI were also used. Results indicated that the area of the third (A3) or fouth leaf (A4) can be used to estimate the total plant leaf area at 106 days after transplanting, by the formulae of 4.57×A3 or 4.01×A4, respectively, because the models had the best predictive ability and possessed the least numbr of estimating factors (only one). Although the growth and development of taro plant might be different as a result of climatic variation at the same sampling time, the precision of the predictive models was about 90% for both spring and fall crop.

metacontributor: 作物組;農化組,胡敏夫,張愛華,呂秀英,劉新裕,M.F. Hu,A.F. Chang,H.Y. Lu,S.Y. Liu
metacreator: 胡敏夫,張愛華,呂秀英,劉新裕,M.F. Hu;A.F. Chang;H.Y. Lu;S.Y. Liu
metarelation: 中華農業研究 39(2): 96-101,Journal of Agricultural Research of China 39(2): 96-101,中華農業研究,39(2):,96-101
metatitle: (39(2):96-101)鉀肥種類與用量對藺草品質與產量之影響,(39(2):96-101)Effect of Type and Amount of Potassium Fertilizer on the Quality and Yield of Mat Rush (Juncus Effusus L. Var. Decipiens Buchen)
metadescription:
於藺草臺農選1號之生育中、後期，配合氮肥施用鉀肥，每公頃施用鉀素(K2O)量爲75、 150、225及300 kg/ha四種變級，分別以氣化鉀拖用(A)125、(B)250、(C)375與(D)500 kg/ha，及以硫酸鉀施用(E)150、(F)300、(G)450與(H)600 kg/ha，計八種處理，並以不施鉀肥區(Ⅰ)爲對照，探討對藺草品質與產量之影響。結果發現一、二級草總和莖數率（100 cm以上）以施用250 kg/ha氯化鉀處理最高，對藺草品質之提昇有最好的效果。每公頃乾草產量以施用氯化鉀375 kg/ha處理稍高，唯長草量較低。施用鉀肥確可提昇藺草品質，但對產量影響較小。肥效比較發現施用氯化鉀之肥效有比硫酸鉀優異之趨勢，顯示藺草品質似受氯根之影響較不明顯。鉀素利用率對藺草品質與產量並無直接影響，但鉀素吸收量與植體含鉀濃度均與長草率有顯著相關。
The effects of KC1 and K2SO4 fertilizers applied at the middle and late growing stages on the grass quality and yield of mat rush cv. Tainung No. 1 was studied. Four levels of K20, i.e., 75, 150, 225 and 300kg/ha, were applied for both KC1 (designated as A, B, C and D treatments, respectively) and K2SO4 (E, F, G and H treatments, respectively) fertilizers. A check plot (treatment Ⅰ) without K fertilization was also included. Experimental results inicated that treatment B (150kg K2O/ha as KC1) produced more grass in the 1st and 2nd grades (with length over 120 and 100 cm, respectively) but less grass in the 3rd (with length between 75 and 99 cm) than other treatments. Treatment C (225kg K20/ha as KC1) gave the highest grass yield, however, the effect of K fertilization on yield was not significant in general. Treatments B and D (300kg K20/ha as KC1) were most effective in terms of the percentage of 1st grade grass produced. Based on the above results, potassium fertilization effected more on quality than on yield of mat rush grass. Comparison between the two types of K fertilizer revealed that KC1 was superior to K2SO4 in mat rush production. The assumption that chloride ion did not affect grass quality was also proposed. The K utilization efficiency was not correlated to either the quality or yield of mat rush. However, K concentration in plant tissue and the amount of K uptaked were positively correlated to the percentage of grass of the 1st and 2nd grades.

metasubject: 環境因子,山藥,生長,產量,Yam (Dioscorea alata L.),Environmental factors,Growth,Yield
metadescription:
在三處不同地區（臺中、嘉義及鳳山）栽培經本所篩選之四種產量較優之山藥品系藉由各地不同之溫度、降雨量、日照時數及土壤肥力狀況，所導致之山藥農藝性狀及產量之變化，研判環境對山藥生長與產量之影響。一般山藥的種植為每年四月，其生長全期可分成三個階段，即初期4─5兩個月為生根、萌芽及長葉時期，中期6─8三個月為蔓葉快速生長時期，後期9─12四個月為新塊莖之形成、整形、肥大及充實時期。在前兩個生長階段中，三地區之氣溫由21.1°C起逐漸上升，地上部蔓葉且於7─8月較高溫時期（27.1─29.5°C）生長最為旺盛，惟新塊莖之生長及充實則需溫較低，三地區在其充實後期（11─12月）之溫度約為15.6─20.2°C；在降雨量方面，鳳山地區在山藥生長初期（4月）之雨量較其他二地為低，而在8─10月反形偏高且較為集中，對於塊莖之形成將較為不利。除了氣溫較高、雨量較多外，在土壤肥力方面，亦以鳳山地區較差。鳳山地區四種山藥之平均產量為12.14t／ha，只為臺中及嘉義之71.7％及72.5％而已。四種山藥品系中以千里達山藥之平均產量最高（17.04t／ha），雖在鳳山較不利地區之產量略差，但在較有利之嘉義及臺中兩地之產量大增，可歸類為較理想型之山藥品系；嘉義地方種山藥之產量次之（16.85t／ha），且其變異係數幾為其他品系之半，顯示產量較穩定；臺東地方種山藥之平均產量最低（13.54t／ha），且變異係數最高，顯示較不理想且不穩定；巴西山藥在鳳山之產量（20.29t／ha），顯著高於其他品系，在其他地區則表現不佳，應屬於特別適合鳳山之山藥品系。,Four yam lines having high yielding potential were tested for their growth and yield responses to different climate and soil conditions at three cultivation locations, i.e., Taichung, Chiayi and Fengshan. The purpose of this study was to evaluate some suitable environmental factors for yam production and to select an ideal line of yam in favour for all possible cultivation locations. 
Based on the results of agronomic characteristics and yield performances, suitable temperature range for growth and development of roots, runners and leaves was between 21.1°C and 29.5°C, and for development and enlargement of new tubers was between 15.6°C and 20.2°C. Comparing the climate and soil conditions at three yam cultivation locations, Fengshan area was less advantageous than Taichung and Chiayi areas, due to the higher temperature throughout all growth stages of yam, the concentrated and large amount of rainfall in the period from August to October, and the least quantities of organic matter and effective K in soil. The averaged tuber yield of 12.14 t/ha at Fengshan was only 71.7% and 72.5% of that at Taichung and Chiayi, respectively. Experimental results indicated that Taichung area was the most suitable place for the cultivation and production of yam. 
Among the four yam lines, Coconut-Lisbon can be recommended as an ideal line of yam. Although it produced less at Fengshan area, its mean yield was significantly more superior than the other lines under better environmental conditions such as Taichung and Chiayi areas. Chiayi local yam was the most stable one (cv=24.63), though its mean yield was not the highest among the lines. On the other hand, Taitung local yam was the most unstable line of yam (cv=53.99). Yield of Brazilien yam was significantly higher at Fengshan area than at two other locations. It might be the only line that can be suggested for that area.

metarelation: 中華農業研究 40(2): 209-224,Journal of Agricultural Research of China 40(2): 209-224,中華農業研究,40(2):,209-224
metatitle: (40(2):209-224)秈稻雜種品系區域適應性試驗,(40(2):209-224)Regional Trial on the Yield Performance and Adaptability of Hybrid Rice Strains
metasubject: 秈稻,雜種水稻,適應性,區域試驗,Indica rice,Hybrid rice,Adaptability,Regional yield trial
metadescription: 試驗的目的在調整雜種水稻品系之種植適期，利用疑似感光性，探討每年種植單期作條件下，是否可發揮雜種優勢而提高增產潛力，以應稻田轉作政策及改進輪作制度之需。本試驗於民國77年利用氣溫較高之夏秋季於全省七個地點進行，測驗八個秈稻雜種品系之稻穀產量及適應性。試驗結果顯示；參試品系在各地之稻穀產量差異極大，在桃園新屋、花蓮、宜蘭三星三處因種植期較早，臺秈雜育1、7及11號等三品系因抽穗障礙而致產量偏低或全無收穫，僅有臺秈雜育2與6號兩品系的平均稻穀產量比對照品種臺中秈10號稍高；在彰化大村等四處採用一般正常二期作之早植，疑似感光性之臺秈雜育1、7及11號三品系平均稻穀產量較對照品種增產10.1─24.9％。臺秈雜育2號在各試驗地區產量最穩定，不論於五月的中間作或七月的一般二期作早植栽培，其平均產量都超過對照品種臺中秈10號。試驗結果顯示如能適當的調整種植時期及利用雜種品系之疑似感光性，可使雜種水稻品系發揮其高產潛力。,Experiments were conducted at 7 locations to study the yield performance, adaptability and response to photoperiod of 8 indica hybrid rice strains, Rice was cultured as a mid-season crop with transplanting dates ranged from May to July in 1988. Experimental results indicated significant yield variation for hybrid strains among locations. At Hsinwu (Taoyuan), Sanhsing (Ilan) and Hualien, early transplanting in May rendered the three photosensitive strains, i. e. Tainung Sen Hybrid (TNSH) Nos. 1,7 and 11, to show difficulties in panicle extrusion. Grain yield was therefore very low, or even no harvest, for these strains. For overall average grain yield of the other 5 photo-insensitive strains, only TNSH Nos. 2 and 6 was higher than the check variety Taichung Sen No. 10. At Tatsun (Changhua), Lutsao (Chiayi), Pingtung and Taitung, late transplanting in June and July was carried out and different results were recorded. The three photo-sensitive strains out yielded the check variety by 10.1-24.9%, and all the photo-insensitive strains. TNSH No.2 showed the best adaptability as its grain yield averaged from 7 locations was 6.3% higher than the check variety. Based on the results of this experiment, it is suggested that by adjusting planting date and utilizing photosensitivity, yield performance of hybrid rice can be improved greatly when cultured under local conditions.

metatitle: (46(3):262-277)水芋葉面積指數動態的季節性變異,(46(3):262-277)Seasonal Variation in Leaf Area Index Dynamics for Wetland Taro [Colocasia esculenta (L.) Schott]
metasubject: 芋,葉面積指數,動態,溫度時間,溫度總合,球莖產量,Taro (Colocasia esculenta (L.) Schott),Leaf area index,Dynamics,Thermal time,Temperature sum,Corm yield
metadescription: 本研究利用從水芋移植後起所累計的每日大於0℃之平均氣溫總和作為溫度時問，以解析本省水芋於不同種植期下葉面積指數 (LAI) 在整個生長期的動態變化及季節變異性，發現LAI為溫度總和的二次指數函數，藉此關係式可預估出所有種植期下水芋LAI達到最大值所需的溫度時間均至少在4000℃以上。不同種植期之LAI增加速率及最大值會因氣候差異影響而表現不一，其中以氣溫為最主要影響因子，其次是日射量。雖然本省水芋可全年種植，但以1月種植期的LAI增加速率最快且在年度間變異最小，倘提前於11月或延後至3-5月種植有可能分別因為低溫、梅雨或颱風等異常氣候而減緩葉片生長。若於7-9月之夏季秋初時種植因整個生長期處於氣溫及日射量均較低的秋冬季，故最不利於水芋葉片生長。最大LAI值(LAIX)及溫度總和達4000℃時之累積LAI (CLAI4000) 對收穫球莖乾物重 (CDWHV) 之影響均呈極顯著的直線關係，表示LAI增加速率及最大值愈大，球莖產量則愈高；當LAIX提高1單位時，CDWHV可增加約68公克；當CLAI4000。提高1單位時，CDWHV可增加約24公克。,Seasonal variation in the dynamics of leaf area index (LAI) for wetland taro was studied by using thermal time analysis. The thermal time was sum of average daily air temperatures above 0℃ computed from the date of transplanting. The LAI of taro was the second-order polynomial exponential function of temperature sums. A thermal time of 4000℃ was required from transplanting to the maximum value of LAI in all transplanting months. Differences in the rates of increase and maximum values of LAI depended largely on the climatic variation, especially on the air temperature. Solar radiation was the second cause of large variation in leaf growth of taro. When transplanting in January, the rate of increase and maximum value of LAI was largest, and the annual deviation in the dynamics of leaf growth was smallest. Earlier planting to November and delayed planting to March or May, low temperature, plum rains and typhoons might decrease the leaf growth. Temperature and solar radiation were less favorable during the whole growing period of taro leaf when transplanting in July to September. The corm dry weight at harvest (CDWHV) was linear related to maximum value of LAI (LAIX) and cumulative LAI reached 4000℃  (CLAI4000). One unit change in LAIX resulted in a change of 68g in CDWHV. One unit change in CLAI4000 resulted in a change of 24g in CDWHV.

metatitle: Concurrent dynamic model in stability analysis,共點動態模式在穩定性分析之應用
metasubject: Arabidopsis thaliana,Concurrence,Concurrent dynamic model,Genotype-time-environment interaction,Stability index
metadescription: oncurrent dynamic model can be used to predict the performance of an untried genotype grown in a hypothetical environment at any growth time, when all the genotypes, growth periods and environments are selected randomly from the breeding population and from the full spectrum of time and environments, respectively. This involves the development of regressions of interaction components onto both genotypic and time-space effects, when the positive correlation between regression coefficient and phenotypic mean exists. The data on fresh weight of twenty-four lines of Arabidopsis thaliana grown under twelve different environmental conditions in seven growth periods were used to demonstrate the proposed model and to test its applicability.

metatitle: (42(2):162-172)水田栽培檳榔心芋葉面積之簡易估算法,(42(2):162-172)A simple method for estimating leaf area in wetland taro (Colocasia esculenta (L.) Schott)
metasubject: 芋,葉面積,推測模式,葉長,葉寬,非破壞性方法,Taro,Leaf area,Predictive model,Leaf length,Leaf width,Nondestructive method
metadescription:
本研究之主要目的在探討臺灣本地栽培種檳榔心芋於水田栽培時之單葉面積的簡易估算方法，藉不同取樣時期的葉長及葉寬之測量，以尋找出一套精確、簡單、迅速且適用於整個生育期之簡易方式來估算葉面積。本試驗於1991年秋作在臺灣省農業試驗所試驗田區進行，自移植當天起至收穫為止，每隔21天，逢機調查10株芋植株，分別測量各葉之葉面積（A）、沿著中肋由葉尖至葉基之最大長度（L1）、葉尖至葉片裂刻之葉長（L2）及最大葉寬（W）。結果顯示，由於芋葉的葉形在整個生長過程中大致維持固定，故母須藉由葉面積測定器，利用葉長及葉寬，即可有效地估算出芋之葉面積大小。而且檳榔心芋的葉尖至葉基之最大葉長與葉尖至葉片裂刻之葉長具有一定的1.21:1之比例關係，因此可任意選擇其中一種的葉長測量值來估算單葉面積，而以後者對非破壞性之分析在取樣過程中較為簡便。水田栽培檳榔心芋之單葉面積估算公式，可為指數函數或迴歸方程式，其估算準確度均甚高且相近。其中以A＝0.68ⅹL1ⅹW或A=0.82ⅹL2ⅹW，其模式中的估算介值最少（僅有一個），且不致因取樣時期不同而異，為最簡單且實用。
This study was made to develop an accurate, simple and rapid method for estimating individual leaf area of wetland taro 
[Colocasia esculenta (L.) Schott] under different growth periods in Taiwan. The experiment was conducted in the fall crop of 1991 at Taiwan Agricultural Research Institute. A total of 10 plants was randomly sampled at 21-day intervals starting at transplanting and ending at harvest. The area (A), length from lamina tip to lamina base along the mid-rib (L1), length from lamina tip to lamina lobe (L2), maximum width of lamina (W) of each leaf were measured.
Results indicated that leaf length and width were available for estimation of leaf area without leaf area meter, because the leaf shape of taro almost kept constant during the whole periods of plant growth. Since there was a proportion relationship of 1.21: 1 between L1 and L2, either of them can be defined as the length measurement. However, L2 facilitates nondestructive measurement of leaf length. The exponential functions and regression equations were all best fitted to estimate leaf area in wetland taro, and had the similar predictive ability. The formulae of A 0.68×L1×W and A= 0.82×L2×W were the most easy and useful methods to estimate the leaf area of wetland taro, because the models possessed the least number of estimating factors (only one), and performed well for different growth periods.

metatitle: (42(4):370-379)薑黃之生長與發育. II.氮鉀肥用量對生育、產量及品質之影響,(42(4):370-379)The Growth and Development of Turmeric (Curcuma aromatica Salisb.) Plants. Ⅱ. Effects of N and K Fertilization on Plant Growth and Rhizome Yield and Quality
metasubject: 薑黃,氮肥,鉀肥,薑黃素,化學組成,Turmeric (Curcuma aromatica Salisb.),N and K fertilization,Curcumin,Chemical composition
metadescription:
本試驗以三種氮（0、90及180 kg N／ha）與鉀（0、100及200 kg K2O／ha）肥用量之不同處理組合，配合磷肥單一用量（40 kg P2O5／ha），於1990及1991年栽培薑黃大黃種，以瞭解不同氮鉀肥用量對植株生育及根莖產量和品質之影響。施用氮鉀肥能促進薑黃葉鞘出土後80天之株高、葉長、葉寬及葉數等農藝性狀表現，除葉數呈極顯著之N×K交感效應外，其他性狀無交感存在。於生育後期（葉鞘出土後140天）進行調查，則施用氮鉀肥僅對株高、葉長及分枝數有增加的效果，而鉀肥可促進分株數；除葉寬外，其他農藝性狀均未顯示顯著之N×K交感效應。在根莖產量方面，不論以鮮重或乾重為基準，均隨氮肥用量增加而提高，薑黃素含量亦以施用氮肥處理較未施氮肥者為高；鉀肥用量對根莖量及薑黃素含量似無顯著影響。在成分組成方面，根莖粗脂肪及游離糖含量受鉀肥用量之顯著影響，以施用100 kg K2O／ha處理之脂肪含量最高，游離糖含量則以100或200 kg K2O／ha處理高於不施用鉀肥處理。灰分含量因施用氮肥反有下降趨勢；P與K含量以不施氮肥處理高於施氮肥處理，施用鉀肥則可提高根莖中K之含量。
Three levels each of N (0, 90, and 180 kg N/ha for N0, N1, and N2, respectively) and K (0, 100, and 200 kg K2O/ha for K0, K1, and K2, respectively) fertilizers were tested in combination along with a fixed reate of P fertilizer (40 kg P2O5/ha) for their effects on the growth and rhizome yield and quality of Curcuma aromatica Salisb. Experimental results indicated that application of N and K fertilizers facilitated the development of plant height and leaf length and width measured at 80 days after the emergence of leaf sheath. Significant effect of N × K interaction was recorded on leaf number only. Investigation at 140 days after the emergence of leaf sheath indicated that N and K fertilization promoted the development of plant height, leaf number, and branch number. Effect of N × K interaction was significant on leaf width only. Rhizome yield on either fresh or dry weight basis was higher for N2 than for N1 and N0 treatments. N fertilization also increased curcumin content in the rhizomes. No significant effect of K fertilization on the yield and curcumin content of the rhizomes was observed. However, K fertilizer showed marked effect on the crude protein and soluble sugar contents. Crude protein content was highest for K1 while soluble sugar content was highest for both K1 and K2 treatments. Ash content tended to decrease with increasing N fertilization. Contents of P and K were higher for N0 than for other N treatments. Increasing K fertilizer resulted in higher K content in the rhizomes.

metatitle: (43(1):29-39)採收期對不同甜菊品系性狀產量及甜味成分之影響,(43(1):29-39)Effects of Harvesting Dates on the Characteristics, Yield, and Sweet Components of Stevia (Stevia rebaudiana Bertoni) Lines
metasubject: 甜菊,採收期,產量,甜味成分,Stevia (Stecia rebaudiana Bertoni),Harvesting date,Yield,Sweet component
metadescription: 不同採收期對甜菊之株高、葉長、葉寬、葉厚、分枝數、莖葉鮮重與乾重、乾葉重等性狀，以及甜味成分含量，均有極顯著或顯著之影響效應。五月份採收時有較七月及九月為佳之性狀表現及較高之莖葉產量，惟甜味成分含量則較低。參試甜菊三品系在株高、葉長、葉寬、乾葉重、莖葉乾重、產量以及甜味成分間之差異顯著。K2品系在上述性狀與產量之表現最優，K2在三次採收期之乾莖葉總產量高達11.5 t／ha，其葉部乾重百分率62.8％亦高居第一。就甜味成分而言，K2品系含最高量之rebaudioside A（RA）、rebaudioside C（RC）及total steviasugar（TSS）；stevioside（ST）含量則以K1最高；K3之RA／ST比值最大，且為K1及K2之30.7及2.2倍高。甜菊之品質評估取決於RA含量或RA／ST比值，故三品系中以K2及K3二品系較具發展潛力。甜菊之產量以乾葉收量為主，並與葉片大小及葉厚呈現正相關關係，此外，RA含量與RC有關，而RA／ST比值則與葉厚有顯著正相關關係。,Three lines of stevia (K1, K2 and K3) and three harvesting dates (May, July and September, 1990) were tested in combination for their effects on the growth, yield and quality of Stevia rebaudiana Bertoni. Experimental results indicated that highly significant or significant effect of different harvesting dates was recorded on plant height, leaf length, leaf width, leaf thickness, tiller number, fresh and dry weight of stems and leaves, dry leaf weight and content of sweet components. Effect of different lines was also significant on plant height, leaf length, leaf width, dry leaf weight, dry weight of leaves and stems, yield and content of sweet components. Field and chemical analysis indicated the superior performance of K2 by its better characteristics, yield and higher contents of rebaudioside A (RA), rebaudioside C (RC) and total stevia sugar (TSS) as compared to the other two lines. However, K1 had a higher content of stevioside (ST) and K3 possessed a higher ratio of RA/ST, which was 30.7 and 2.2 times higher than that of K1 and K2, respectively. Because the content of RA and the ratio of RA/ST are the current criteria for stevia quality, it was suggested that K2 and K3 were the most promising lines for future usage. Correlation analysis showed that dry leaf yield was correlated with leaf size and leaf thickness, the content of RA was correlated with RC, and RA/ST ratio was highly correlated to leaf thickness.

metacontributor: 作物組,呂秀英,Hsiu-Ying Lu
metarelation: 中華農業研究 45(4): 336-351,Journal of Agricultural Research of China 45(4): 336-351,中華農業研究,45(4):,336-351
metatitle: (45(4):336-351)區域試驗不均衡資料之穩定性子集合分析,(45(4):336-351)Subset Method for Assessing Varietal Stability in Unbalanced Regional Trial Data
metasubject: 子集合分析,穩定性,區域試驗,不均衡資料,迴歸,Subset analysis,Stability,Regional trial,Unbalanced data,Regression
metadescription: 本省區域試驗一般採用的穩定性介量多以最受廣泛使用的直線迴歸分析法為主。該法僅適用於每一基因型與環境組合都有資料之場合，因此一旦含有缺區，便無法正確估得環境指標，並進行穩定性分析；過去一般處理缺區的方式，係將含缺區的品系或環境全部刪除，使其呈均衡資料後，再進行穩定性分析，如此在缺區數多時勢必會造成品系或環境數減少，反而降低了評估結果的準確度。對此，本研究利用子集合分析法以擴大穩定性分析之應用範圍至不均衡的區域試驗資料。子集合分析可處理含交感模式之不均衡資料，在觀念上相當簡單直接，係就所分割成的兩個不同子集合均衡資料各進行穩定性分析，並利用兩子集合重疊部份，對共存環境下之品系進行穩定性選拔。惟該法在使用上必須注意，所有品系的共存環境數不得太少。,Linear regression analysis is the most common and useful method to assess the varietal stability in a regional trial. However, a major practical limition to date, stability analysis have been a requirement of no missing data, that is, data for every genotype and environment combination or treatment have been necessary. The precison of stability analysis can be unduly influenced by removing all the data of the genotypes or environments which contain missing plot, because of the reduction in number of genotypes and environments. This study proposed a subset method for analyzing stability of unbalanced data in regional trials. Subset analyses for unbalanced data with interaction model were simple and straightforward. The set of unbalanced data was divided into two subsets of balanced data, then one used the stability analysis for these subsets. The analyses of overlapping subsets of the data revealed available information to selecting superior genotypes with common environments. This subset method for stability analysis of unbalanced regional trial data performed well when there were many common environments for genotypes.

metacontributor: 作物組,賴明信,陳正昌,郭益全,呂秀英,陳治官,李長沛,曾東海,Ming-Hsing Lai,Chen-Chang Chen,Yih-Chuan Kuo,Hsui-Ying Lu,Chyr-Guan Chern,Charng-Pei Li,Tung-Hai Tseng

metarelation: 中華農業研究 45(3): 203-217,Journal of Agricultural Research of China 45(3): 203-217,中華農業研究,45(3):,203-217
metatitle:
(45(3):203-217)現行水稻推廣品種生產力與氮肥用量之關係. I. 氮肥用量對水稻產量及產量構成要素之影響,(45(3):203-217)The Relationship between Grain Productivity and Nitrogen-fertilizer Rate of Currently 
Cultivated Rice Cultivars 
I. The Effects of Different Nitrogen Rates on Grain Yield and Yield Components in Rice
metasubject: 水稻,稻穀產量,氮肥,農藝性狀,Rice,Grain yield,Nitrogen,Agronomic characteristics
metadescription: 以四個現行推廣之水稻品種台農67號、臺稉2號、臺稉6號及臺中秈10號為材料，第一期作施以60、100、140、180kg N／ha，第二期作施以60、90、120、180kg N／ha等四個氮肥處理，於1993及1994年假農試所農場連續進行兩年四期作試驗，探討參試品種於不同氮肥用量下稻穀產量、農藝性狀、病害發生程度及稻田土壤主要養份之變化。第一期作品種之稻穀產量與氮肥用量之關係，以臺中秈10號表現最佳，隨施氮量增加遞增；臺農67號以140kg N／ha處理產量最高，增加至180kg N／ha時因倒伏而誘發穗頸稻熱病與紋枯病，其平均產量反而降低；臺稉2號與臺稉6號兩品種亦以140kg N／ha產量最高，氮肥用量再增加對稻穀產量幫助不明顯。第二期作各品種產量因氮肥用量處理之差異不顯著，增施氮肥提高倒伏指數及病害為害程度。增加氮肥用量雖然可以增加植株穗數，但卻對稔實率及千粒重有負面影響。就試驗小區土壤分析之結果，發現土壤之有機質含量與氮肥施用量之多寡沒有關係，而土壤之酸鹼值呈微量降低，同時各處理區間亦無一定趨勢存在，顯示施用氮肥對農地土壤之影響是長期作用累積之效果。本試驗之結果顯示參試四個水稻推廣品種的氮肥施用量，第一期以不超過140kg N／ha為佳，而第二期作可降低至90kg N／ha，可以降低值株高度、倒伏指數及病害為害程度，成熟期更可以提早，雖然稻穀產量略微減產，但維持稻米品質及節省投入成本可彌補其不足。,A total of four currently cultivated rice cultivars, Tainung 67, Taikeng 2 and 6, and Taichung Sen 10 (TCS 10), were used in this study. The experiment was conducted at the experimental farm of Taiwan Agricultural Research linstitute under four nitrogen rates (60, 100, 140, 180kg N/ha for the 1st rice crop season; 60, 90, 120, 150 kg N/ha for the 2nd rice crop season) in 1993 and 1994. The objectives of this study were to elucidate the relationship between grain productivity and nitrogen-fertilizer rate for those rice cultivars, emphasizing on the performance of grain yield, yield components and the changes in some nutrients of soil and infestation of diseases. in the 1st rice crop season, the positive response of grain yield to increased nitrogen rate was found only in TCS 10. Grain yield of the three japonica rice cultivars peaked at the introgen rate of 140kg/ha. Under 180kg N/ha condition, as well as the infestation of blast and sheath blight were observedin Tainung 67. The grain yield under 180kg N/ha condition was lower among treatments for Tainung 67. On the another hand, the grain yieid was not significantly increased as the nitrogen rate changed from 140 to 180kg N/ha for Taikeng 2 and 6. In the 2nd rice crop season, the positive response of grain yield to nitrogen rates was not found in all the cultivars used. Panicle number per hill increased in response to high nitrogen rate, however, both seed set and 1,000 grain weight decresed in the four cultivars. It is concluded that lodging and pest infestation were the two key factors in affecting grain yield with increasing rate of nitrogen. Soil analysis indicataed no significant changes in organic matter content and pH value due to nitrogen treatment. Considering lodging and infestation of diseases, grain yield and quality, practice cost and straw, yield, it is suggested that the recommended nitrogen rate was 140kg N/ha for the 1st rice crop season and 90kg N/ha for the 2nd crop.

metacontributor: 作物組,呂椿棠,呂秀英,Chun-Tang Lu,Hsiu-Ying Lu
metacreator: 呂椿棠;呂秀英,Chun-Tang Lu;Hsiu-Ying Lu
metarelation: 中華農業研究 44(4): 403-412,Journal of Agricultural Research of China 44(4): 403-412,中華農業研究,44(4):,403-412
metatitle: (44(4):403-412)試區形狀及方向對稻作田區試驗準確度之影響,(44(4):403-412)Influence of Shape and Orientation of Plots on the Precision of Field Experiments with Rice
metasubject: 水稻,試區形狀,試區方向,試驗準確度,均等試驗,相對效率,Rice,Plot shape,Plot orientation,Experimental precision,Uniformity trial,Relative efficiency
metadescription: 本研究目的在利用臺灣省農業試驗所進行之稻作均度試驗，探討試區形狀及方向對稻作試驗準確度之影響，以有利於試驗者進行最佳選擇。本試驗均度試驗的行株距採用一般產量試驗之28cm×16cm。將均度試驗模擬成逢機完全區集設計（RCBD）的各種不同形狀及方向之試區，估計各種試區的變異係數值，並探討不同形狀、方向之試區間的相對效率，結果得知，當試驗田區為逢機的土壤變異型態時，應儘可能採用正方試區，例如固定試區大小為100叢時，均質試驗田區以10行×10叢或5行×20叢之試區的效率最高；反之，當試區存在有肥力差異傾向時，長形試區比較有效，其平行於肥力梯度方向的長邊愈長，準確度更高，若肥力梯度沿著行的方向發生時，則試區大小為100叢的最適試區形狀及方向為20行×5叢。,The objective of this research was to investigate the influence of plot shape and plot orientation on the precision of field experiments with rice by using uniformity trials data in Taiwan Agricultural Research Institute. Uniformity trials were conducted with a row spacing of 28cm and within-row spacing of 16cm. The trials were subdivided by simulating a randomized complete block design (RCBD) with various combinations of plot shape and orientation. Coeffcients of variability and relative efficiencies of different plot shape and orientation were estimated. When the soil variability pattern of the experimental field is distributed random, plots should be square as possible. The optimum plot shape with a adequate plot size of 100 plants was 10 rows × 10 plants or 5 rows × 20 plants. When the fertility gradient of the area is present, a rectangular plot with parallel orientation in the direction of the fertility gradient would give higher precision. Increasing plot length in the direction of fertility gradient was more effective in reducing variability. With constant plot size of 100 plants, the optimum plot shape was 20 rows × 5 plants when the fertility gradient parallels the rows of the field.

metacontributor: 作物組,呂椿棠,呂秀英,曾東海,Chun-Tang Lu,Hsiu-Ying Lu,Tung-Hai Tseng
metacreator: 呂椿棠,呂秀英,曾東海,Chun-Tang Lu;Hsiu-Ying Lu;Tung-Hai Tseng
metarelation: 中華農業研究 44(3): 229-241,Journal of Agricultural Research of China 44(3): 229-241,中華農業研究,44(3):,229-241
metatitle: (44(3):229-241)利用稻作均度試驗資料估計最適試區大小及重複次數,(44(3):229-241)Estimation of Optimum Plot Size and Replicates Number Using Data from Rice Uniformity Trials
metasubject: 水稻,均度試驗,試區大小,重覆次數,土壤異質性指標,Rice,Uniformity trial,Plot size,Replicates number,Soil heterogeneity index
metadescription: 適當地決定田間試驗設計之試區大小及重複次數，可提高試驗處理比較之準確度。試區太小及重複次數太少，試驗結果將不可靠；但倘試區太大及重複次數太多，則會浪費時間及資源。本研究目的在以臺灣省農業試驗所進行之稻作均度試驗，估計最適的試區大小及重複次數。利用摺疊分類之規劃，將均度試驗田區模擬成各種可能的試區大小，並估算不同試區大小的變方估值，根據變方比較法及最大曲度法，依試驗面積及可用資源之限制與否，估計出最適的試區大小在20及100叢之間；並在假設一逢機完全區集設計試驗下，設定不同試區大小、重複次數與處理數之各種組合，利用Hatheway法估算各組合的處理平均值間之真差值，估計出在最適試區大小時的最適重複次數為4次。,Efficient testing of treatment differences in field experiments depends on experimental precision. Agronomists constantly have to face the decision of the optimum choice of plot size and replicates number to achieve the best efficiency for their experiments. Too samll plots and replicates may give unreliable results; unnecessarily large plots and replicates waste time and resources. The objective of this research was to determine optimum plot size and replicates number by using data from rice uniformity trials in Taiwan Agricultural Research Institute. The trials were subdivided following a criterion of hierarchical classification, simulating various plot sizes. Variances for different plot sizes were estimated. Using the methods of comparison of variances and maximum curvature, the optimum plot size was estimated within a range of 20 to 100 plants that depended on the limit of experimental areas and available resources. Using the Hatheway′s method, the true differences of treatments for various combinations of plot size, treatments number and replicates number were used to estimate the optimum replicates number in a randomized complete block design. The optimum replicates number with a adequate plot size was four.

metacontributor: 作物組;農場組,陳烈夫,呂秀英,呂椿棠,賴吉雄,Lit-Fu Chan,Hsiu-Ying Lu,Chun-Tang Lu,Chi-Hsiung Lai

metatitle: (44(1):59-71)水芋葉面積與乾物質生產之關係,(44(1):59-71)Relationship Between Leaf Area and Dry Biomass Production in Wetland Taro [Colocasia esculenta (L.) Schott]
metasubject: 芋,葉面積指數,乾物質生產,淨化同速率,作物生長速率,Taro,Leaf area index,Dry biomass production,Net assimilation rate,Crop growth rate
metadescription: 物質生產之預測對芋作物收穫計畫及製粉操作非常重要，本研究之主要目的在利用葉面積指數來探討及預測臺灣水田栽培檳榔心芋的乾物質生產。本研究分別於1991及1993年秋作在臺灣省農業試驗所試驗田區進行兩年試驗，自移植日起至收穫為止，每隔一個月逢機調查10株芋植株，測量各株之葉面積、地上部乾物重（UDW）及球莖乾重（CDW），並估算不同時期的葉面積指數（LAI）、淨同化速率（NAR）及作物生長速率（CGR）。試驗結果得知，水芋LAI在移植後第3個月起開始快速增加，於移植後第6、7個月時LAI曲線有一明顯的尖峰，隨後LAI即降下，但不同年度試驗之LAI曲線受到氣象因素影響而有變化，在移植後第4至7個月期間倘逢高溫及多日照，可提高LAI的增加速度及最大值，此為生理上影響乾物質生產增加之重要原因。水芋的LAI與乾物質生產之間的關係則表現相當一致，並不受年度或氣象之差異影響而異。水芋在LAI達最大值之前，地上部乾物重及球莖乾重均可因LAI之增加而增加，且與NAR並無明顯的負相關關係，但倘LAI大於最大值，則NAR及CGR值會顯著下降；當累積葉面積指數（CLAI）達到某一臨界值之前，水芋之乾物質生產可利用CLAI之直線迴歸函數來預測，但該臨界值及所估得之迴歸估值會隨著環境條件不同而異。,The prediction of biomass production is important for scheduling harvest and milling operations in taro. The objective of this study was to evalute and predict the dry biomass production of wetland taro [Colocasia esculenta (L.) Schott] based on leaf area index information. Two experiments were conducted in the fall crop of 1991 and 1993 at Taiwan Agricultural Research Institute. A total of 10 plants was randomly sampled at one-month intervals starting at transplanting and ending at harvest. The total leaf area, upper plant dry weight (UDW) and corm dry weight (CDW) of each plant were measured to estimate the leaf area index (LAI), net assimilation rate (NAR) and crop growth rate (CGR) of dry biomass. The results revealed that the LAI of taro increased greatly with time starting from 3 months after transplanting, and reached a maximum value at 6 or 7 months after transplanting, and declined thereafter. Climatic variation can lead to significant difference in LAI curve of taro. The rate of increase and maximum value of LAI increased with high temperature and high solar radiation during the growth periods from 4 to 7 months after transplanting. The effects of LAI on dry biomass production were the same between different years and different climatic variation. Before LAI reached a maximum value, UDW and CDW of taro increased markedly as LAI increased. No significant negative correlation between NAR and LAI was found before LAI reached its maximum. On the contrary, NAR and CGR decreased immediately when maximum LAI was achieved. Dry biomass was linearly related to the cumulative leaf area index (CLAI) in taro until CLAI reached a critical value. This linear relationships could be useful for predicting taro biomass production, however, the critical value and regression coefficient used to estimate biomass production might vary with diverse environmental conditions.

metatitle: (43(4):467-468)台灣新發現黔梨木蝨(同翅目：木蝨科),(43(4):467-468)New Record of Psylla qianli (Homoptera : Psyllidae) from Taiwan
metasubject: 同翅目,木蝨科,黔梨木蝨,Psylla qianli,Psyllidae,Pear tree
metadescription:
本文首次記錄危害臺灣梨樹之黔梨木蝨（Psylla qianli Li & Yang ) ，而且該木蝨亦為臺灣之新記錄種。
Psylla qianli Li & Yang (Homoptera : Psyllidae) was recorded in Taiwan for the first time. This species is a pest of pear trees.

metatitle: (43(3):293-301)水田栽培檳榔心芋全株葉面積之估算. II. 破壞性取樣法,(43(3):293-301)Estimation of Total Plant Leaf Area in Wetland Taro 〔Colocasia Esculenta (L.) Schott〕Ⅱ. Destructive Sampling
metasubject: 芋,全株葉面積,葉重,破壞性取樣,預測模式準確度,Taro,Total plant leaf area,Leaf weight,Destructive sampling,Precision of predictive model
metadescription:
本研究之主要目的在探討臺灣本地栽培種檳榔心芋於水田栽培時之全株葉面積的簡易估算方法，利用不同時期以破壞性取樣所測量之鮮葉重與乾葉重資料，尋找出一套精確且迅速之簡易方式來估算全株葉面積。本試驗於1991年秋作在臺灣省農業試驗所試驗田區進行，自移植日起至收穫為止，每隔21天逢機調查10株芋植株，測量各株之全株葉面積及葉片鮮、乾重，以建立全株葉面積之估算式；繼之再以1992年秋作及1993年春作於同一栽培地點所取得之20株芋植株逢機樣本，來檢測該估算模式在不同期作下的推測能力。結果顯示，水田栽培檳榔心芋之全株葉面積估算公式，以乾葉重乘上225即可，此相當於每公克葉乾物質重約有225cm2之葉面積。倘欲以鮮葉重來估算全葉面積，當乾葉重與鮮葉重之比例值等於0.14時，以直接乘以32的估算效果最好，但一旦因期作環境不同造成葉片含水量有差異，則其預測準確度會因葉片乾鮮重之比例改變而受到影響。,This study was made to develop an accurate, simple and rapid method for estimating total plant leaf area of wetland taro 
〔Colocasia Esculenta (L.) Schott〕 by using destructive sampling. The experiment was conducted in the fall crop of 1991 at Taiwan Agricultural Research Institute (TART). A total of 10 plants was randomly sampled at 21-day intervals starting at transplanting and ending at harvest. The total leaf area (TA), leaf fresh weight (LFW) and leaf dry weight (LDW) of each plant were measured. Moreover, to test the predictive ability for models of total plant leaf area estimation in different crop seasons, random samples of 20 plants from the experiments in the fall crop of 1992 and spring crop of 1993 at TARI were also used. Results indicated that the leaf dry weight can be used to estimate the total plant leaf area in taro during the whole growth periods under different crop seasons, by a formula of 225×LDW. This is equivalent to 225cm2 leaf area per gram of leaf dry biomass. The formula of 32×LFW were best fitted to estimate total plant leaf area only when the ratio of LDW to LFW was equal to 0.14. However, the precision of predictive models by using leaf fresh weight would vary with environmental variation under different crop seasons, because the ratio of LDW to LFW may change with water content of leaf.

metacontributor: 作物組,呂秀英,Hsiu-Ying Lu
metarelation: 中華農業研究 43(3): 283-292,Journal of Agricultural Research of China 43(3): 283-292,中華農業研究,43(3):,283-292
metatitle: (43(3):283-292)穩定性迴歸分析之SAS程式,(43(3):283-292)A SAS Program for Regression Analysis of Stability
metasubject: SAS程式,穩定性,迴歸分析,區域試驗,環境指標,SAS program,Stability,Regression analysis,Regional yield trial,Environmental index
metadescription: 利用直線迴歸分析法來解釋植物穩定性的問題，是本省目前最常用而有效的方法。本文以個人電腦之SAS軟體中最基本的STAT功能系統，編寫出一個穩定性迴歸分析程式，並以一數例說明其進行分析的流程及結果，以幫助農業研究工作者進行區域試驗資料之穩定性迴歸分析。程式之輸出結果內容包含有綜合變方分析、各品系在不同環境下之產量平均值、環境指標估值、迴歸分析之統計值摘要表、穩定性係數對品系平均產量之圖示結果。,Linear regression method is widely used to investigate the plant stability in Taiwan. A program written in SAS/STAT software is to presented for regressinon analysis of stability. This program runs on personal computers. The procedure is also illustrated through an example. It is useful to agricultural researchers who are analyzing the varietal performance in regional trials by regression approach. Output contains combined analysis of variance, mean yield of each variety under different environments, environmental index, summary statistics of regression analysis, plotting of stability index to varietal mean.

metacontributor: 作物組,呂椿棠,呂秀英,Chun-Tang Lu,Hsiu-Ying Lu
metacreator: 呂椿棠,呂秀英,Chun-Tang Lu;Hsiu-Ying Lu
metarelation: 中華農業研究 43(2): 165-172,Journal of Agricultural Research of China 43(2): 165-172,中華農業研究,43(2):,165-172
metatitle: (43(2):165-172)田區大小及形狀對均度試驗土壤異質性評估之影響,(43(2):165-172)Effects of Field Size and Shape on the Measurement of Soil Heterogeneity in Uniformity Trials
metasubject: 均度試驗,土壤異質性,田區大小,田區形狀,水稻,Uniformity trial,Soil heterogeneity,Field size,Field shape,Rice
metadescription: 本研究之目的在利用1991─1993年共兩年四期作的水稻均度試驗產量資料，探討田區大小及形狀對均度試驗土壤異質性評估之影響。同一試驗所估得之土壤異質性指標（b）不會因為年度期作之不同而有差異。田區大小形狀不同，對b值之估計有影響，小區太小，容易受到鄰近植株邊際效應之影響，而呈高度負相關之土壤異質性指標b＞1的極端異質狀態；隨著試驗田區面積增大至邊際效應已顯得不重要時，b值將可趨於穩定。但田區過大，均度試驗所需成本也愈高，因此在兼顧準確度及成本下，應探求一最小面積及最適形狀的田區。最小田區之決定，尚須考慮基本單位小區之選擇。均度試驗之田區大小至少要含有100個以上的基本單位，且田區形狀應儘可能接近於正方形。,The purpose of this study was to investigate the effects of field size and shape on the measurements of soil heterogeneity. The yield data from the rice uniformity trials were obtained from four crop seasons in 1991-1993. The estimates of index of soil heterogeneity (b) at the same area did not vary with years and seasons. Change in field size and shape exhibited effects on the estimates of b. A b value greater than 1, which indicated negative correlation between contiguous plots, was obtained when the field size was too small. The value of b tended to be converged to a constant value as the field size was large enough so that the edge effects became insignificant. As the cost of operation increased with increasing field size in an uniformity trial, the minimum size and optimum shape of the field should be estimated to balance precision and cost. Minimum size was governed by the plots of basic unit chosen. It was estimated the size should be at least 100 times the size of basic units and the shape should be as nearly square as possible in an uniformity trial.

metacontributor: 作物組,邱善美,呂秀英,胡敏夫,S.M. Chiu,H.Y. Lu,M.F. Hu

metatitle: (41(4):349-356)鐘麻品種特性調查及產量性狀間之相關研究,(41(4):349-356)Investigation on the Agronomic and Yield Characteristics in Kenaf (Hibiscus cannabinus L.)
metasubject: 鐘麻,原莖,纖維作物,Kenaf,Hibiscus cannabinus,Stem yield,Fiber crop
metadescription:
以鐘麻26品種（系）為試驗材料進行田間試驗，調查農藝與產量性狀表現，並分析原莖產量性狀間之相關。自性狀調查得知，供試品種（系）中以裂葉型（69％）多於圓葉型（31％)，莖色除臺農1號為淡紅色及Madras Red為紅色外，其他品種（系）概為綠色。品種間一株朔果數、一朔果種子數及百粒種子重的變異頗大，但以品種Cuba表現最差。經綜合變方分析結果，品種（系）間莖長、鮮重及乾重的差異均極為顯著，且品種（系）與年度間有顯著交感作用。莖徑及鮮皮厚度於同年度在不同品種（系）間雖有極顯著差異，但所有供試材料在不同年度表現的差異性則均一致。依據五種性狀間之相關分析結果，顯示莖長與莖徑、莖徑與鮮皮厚度及產量與莖長之間均為正相關，但莖徑及鮮皮厚度對產量無直接影響，換言之，決定原莖產量之最主要因素為徑長。
Twenty-six varieties/lines of kenaf (Hibiscus cannabinus L.) were cultivated in 1990 and 1991 at the experimental farm of TARI. Agronomic and yield characteristics were evaluated and the correlations among yield traits were analyzed. Eighteen out of the 26 genotypes possessed the lobed-shaped leaves while 8 genotypes had round-shaped leaves. All varietise/lines were green in stem skin color, the only exceptions were Tainung No.1 and Madras red, being light-red and red, respectively. The number of capsules per plant, number of seeds per capsule and 100-seed weight varied among the tested varieties/lines. The Cuba variety had the lowest value in these fruit and seed characteristics. 
Varietal effect and varietal×year interaction on stem length, stem fresh weight and stem dry weight were significant. Significant varietal difference in stem diameter and skin thickness also existed, the tedency was the same in different years. 
Correlation analysis among the five yield characteristics indicated positive correlations between stem length and stem diameter, between stem diameter and skin thickness and between stem yield and stem length. There was no direct effect of stem diameter and skin thickness on stem yield. The results suggested that the determining factor for stem yield was stem length.

metacontributor: 作物組,呂秀英,呂椿棠,陳正昌,H.Y. Lu,C.T. Lu,C.C. Chen
metacreator: 呂秀英;呂椿棠;陳正昌,H.Y. Lu;C.T. Lu;C.C. Chen
metarelation: 中華農業研究 41(4): 317-330,Journal of Agricultural Research of China 41(4): 317-330,中華農業研究,41(4):,317-330
metatitle: (41(4):317-330)稉稻產量構成要素及農藝性狀對產量穩定性之影響,(41(4):317-330)Effects of Yield Components and Agronomic Traits on Yield Stability of Japonica Rice
metasubject: 遺傳率,間接選拔,稉稻,區域試驗,產量構成要素,產量穩定性,Heritability,Indirect selection,Japonica rice,Regional yield trial,Yield component,Yield stability
metadescription:
本研究之目的在利用1990至1991年間11個稉稻品系於7個地區進行兩年各二期作的區域試驗資料為分析材料，闡明稉稻產量構成要素及農藝性狀對產量穩定性的影響，並探討利用其他性狀進行間接選拔以提高稻穀產量穩定性的可行性。結果得知：
1. 不同期作下不同性狀配合直線迴歸模式的效率有相當之差異，各性狀之廣義遺傳率愈高，適用性也愈好。
2. 由於第一期作產量的平均值與穩定性係數間之正相關關係不存在，因此可從中選育出高產且穩定的品系，如臺稉育34號、4268號、4160號及4156號等四品系；第二期作之產量，各新育成品系似乎並無突出優秀之表現，且產量愈高者其穩定性也較差。
3. 對產量穩定性有影響的性狀在第一期作為千粒重，第二期作則為全生育日數；亦即千粒重較小或早熟品系的產量對環境之變化較為穩定。但由於此等性狀對產量穩定性的影響結果似乎與遺傳機制無關，故將之應用於產量穩定性的間接選拔上，仍相當困難。
Experimental data from the 1991-1992 regional trials of japonica rice were used to determine the effects of yield components and some agronomic traits on yield stability. The possibility of indirect selection of these traits for enhancing yield stability was also examined. The results were summarized as follows. 
The effectiveness of regression analysis for yield stability varied with characters under different crop seasons. Quantitative characters with a high broad sense heritability were more applicable by the linear regression approach. 
There was no positive correlation between the mean grain yield and yield stability index in the first crop season, it was therefore possible to breed genotypes with grain yield and yield stability higher than the mean values. Some examples were strains Taiken Yu 34, 4268, 4160 and 4156 in the first crop season. Grain yield of the tested strains was low in the second crop season. The mean yield was lower for a strain with higher yield stability, and vice versa. 
Lower 1,000-kernel weight and early maturity seemed to contribute to yield stability in japonica rice grown in the first and second crop seasons, respectively. Data from this experiment indicated that the influence of these two traits on yield stability was not related to genetic mechanism, indirect selection of the two traits for higher yield stability in japonica rice was therefore not recommended.

metacontributor: 作物組,呂秀英,Hsiu-Ying Lu
metarelation: 中華農業研究 40(4): 385-395,Journal of Agricultural Research of China 40(4): 385-395,中華農業研究,40(4):,385-395
metatitle: (40(4):385-395)獨立性環境指標在落花生產量穩定性分析之建立與應用,(40(4):385-395)Independent Environmental Indices for Stability Analysis in Peanut Yield Trials
metasubject: 穩定性分析,獨立性環境指標,落花生,Stability analysis,Independent environmental index,Peanut
metadescription: 直線迴歸模式能有效地估計數量性狀對環境的適應能力。然而，傳統的直線迴歸模式中係以各環境均值與總平均值的離差作為該一試驗的環境效應估值，再以各品種收量隨此環境指標作迴歸所得的迴歸係數來評價品種的穩定性。由於該環境指標與分析資料間並非獨立，實不符合迴歸分析中自變數為固定值的一般假設，因此，本研究以落花生品系試驗資料為實例說明，重新設定直線迴歸之各種獨立性環境指標，並與傳統環境指標評估品系穩定性的結果作一比較討論，結果發現：利用逢機、分層及極端不同取樣方法將所有品系分為兩組，彼此利用他組之環境效應估值作為該組的環境指標，與傳統環境指標之評估結果幾無差異，應是最理想的獨立性環境指標。若不計迴歸離差均方上的影響，則亦可將各迴歸品系的資料自整個資料中去除後，以剩餘品系資料的環境效應估值作為獨立性環境指標，但必須每一品系各有不同的環境指標，計算上比較麻煩。選定一對照品系，以其環境離差作為各參試品系的共同環境指標估值，必須選擇對環境反應與參試品系相同型式的標準品系。至於將資料所有重複逢機劃分為指標組及受試組的方法所建立的獨立性環境指標，只有在重複次數夠多時，始能獲致較準確的穩定性評估結果。,Linear regression model is useful to evaluate the adaptation of a quantitative character to the change of environments. However, in the conventional regression analysis for stability, mean performance of individual genotypes is regressed on the environmental index measured by the mean performance of all genotypes grown in that environment. The use as independent variable of values which are not independent of the phenotypic variable regressed on to them, therefore the assessment of stability should correspond most closely to the average response of the trial individuals. In the present study, regression analysis on peanut yield trials were performed to construct different measures of independent environmental values and to compare their relative stability. The results showed that division of the genotypes by random, stratified and extreme method into two subsets using one subset to measure the genotype-environment interactions and the second subset to assess the environments made little difference on the general conclusion of regression analysis, thus can be regarded as ideal independent environmental indices. Inclusion of assessment genotype to assess its environmental values is useful when the effect on deviations from regression mean squares (S2d) is ignored, but its use becomes difficult since there requires the caculation of a separate environmental index for each regression. Use of check genotypes which respond in the same way as the trial genotypes to assess the environments may also be satisfactory. Division of replicates at random into two subsets is preferred only when there are many replicates in the trial.

metacontributor: 作物組,呂秀英,Hsiu-Ying Lu
metarelation: 中華農業研究 40(3): 255-261,Journal of Agricultural Research of China 40(3): 255-261,中華農業研究,40(3):,255-261
metatitle:
(40(3):255-261)基因型與環境交感效應之迴歸分析共點性在不同生長時間下之動態研究,(40(3):255-261)Dynamic Studies on Concurrence with Growth 
Time in Linear Regression Analysis of 
Genotype-Environment Interactions
metasubject: 基因型與環境交感效應,迴歸分析,共點性,Arabidopsis thaliana,Genotype-environment interaction,Regression analysis,Concurrence,Arabidopsis thaliana
metadescription:
直線迴歸模式能有效地估計數量性狀對環境的適應能力。然而，利用交感效應隨環境指標所求得的〝穩定性〞，係一種相對性的概念，隨參試材料與環境因子的種類、數目之不同，其估值也改變，因此，直線迴歸模式實為一種描述性的穩定性模式，而無法用之於預測工作，同時也造成表型平均值與穩定性係數之間往往存在正相關關係。此種相關的情況，即所有迴歸線通過一共點。在符合直線迴歸模式且基因型與環境效應均為逢機型之前提下，由逢機樣本估得之共點乃提供了一預測上極有用的指標。另一方面，植物性狀的穩定性常因生長及發育的不同而異，故所估得之共點介量也會隨生長時間而有變化。因此針對此問題，本研究將以實驗植物Arabidopsis thaliana為材料，建立共點介量與生長時間的特定關係，以探明共點性隨著生長發育之變化趨勢，俾能誘導出一測定穩定性的預測模式。
結果得知：各生長時間下除了第1週外，共點性均存在，所估計的共點皆落在生產正常範圍內，故採用迴歸係數估值作為穩定性之選拔準則有效，然其所選出的高產且穩定基因型會因生長時間之不同而改變。由本研究Arabidopsis thaliana的資料配合結果，顯示共點係數ct與時間t之間呈一種指數生長曲線關係，其值在生長初期最大而隨時間經過則變小，此可用以預測同族群其他未受試之基因型及環境，但預測的可靠性僅侷限於該特定時間內。,Linear regression model is useful to evaluate the adaptation of a quantitative character to the change of environments. However, the stability in the regression model is a relative measure depending on the genotypes and environments included in the test. Therefore, the regression model for G×E interaction is a descriptive model based on the data being analysed, but not a predictive model. This results in positive correlations between the phenotypic mean and regression coefficient. The correlations to occur is that all regression lines for all genotypes pass throught a common point, that is the regression should be concurrent. The concurrent point can be used to predict the performance of untried genotype when grown in a hypothetical environment, if both genotype and environment are considered as random samples from larger populations. Moreover, the stability of a quantitative character of a plant often varies with time at different stage of growth and development. This results in the diversity of concurrence for different periods. Thus, this project is to study the tendency of concurrence with growth time, and establish a forecasting model in plant stability by inducing the close relationship between concurrence and growth time into the linear model. The experiments will be conduced to test reliability and applicability of the above-mentioned empirical model by using Arabidopsis thaliana plants as materials. 
The results show that the concurrence occurred at various plant growth stages except the first week. With a close relationship between concurrent parameter and growth time, a combined concureent model was then introduced. It appeared to be an exponential curve based on the data of Arabidopsis thaliana, thus it can be used to predict the performance of an untried genotype when grown in a hypothetical environment at different growth time, if both genotype and environment are considered as random samples from larger populations.

metacontributor: 作物組,呂秀英,Hsiu-Ying Lu
metatitle:
(38(3):335-345)基因型與環境交感效應之迴歸分析的擴充－共點模式,(38(3):335-345)Concurrent Model: the Extension of Linear Regression 
AnaIysis of Genotype-Environment Interactions
metadescription:
共點模式在各試因均為逢機樣本之前提下，可對同一族羣其他未受試基因型在未受試環境下的反應表現進行預測。該模式係以共點之觀念引入評價適應性的迴歸模式中，而將交感成分同時隨基因型效應及環境效應作迴歸分析。其共點介量的預測效果與生物學上之解釋，在本文中均予詳加探討。
最後，並配之以Arabidopsis thaliana植物鮮重資料作為實例分析，以說明共點模式在基因型與環境交感效應之研究上的應用價值。
Concurrent model can be used to predict the performance of an untried genotype when grown in a hypothetical environment if both genotype and environment are considered as random samples from larger populations. This involves a development of the regression analysis used in assessment of adaptation, and allows for the regression of interaction components onto both genotypic and environmental effects. The usefulness of the single joint regression for prediction is outlined, and the biological interpretation of concurrent is given. 
The applicability of the emprical models to the data on plant fresh weight of Arabidopsis thaliana is illustrated by means of example.

metacontributor: 作物組,呂秀英,Hsiu-Ying Lu
metatitle: (38(2):208-215)非介量穩定性分析法之研究. I.非介量與介量穩定性測量值間的比較,(38(2):208-215)Studies on Nonparametric Method of Phenotypic Stability. I. Comparison Between Nonparametric and Parametric Measures
metasubject: 非介量穩定性,介量穩定性
metadescription:
變異係數（cv）與直線迴歸係數（b）為目前用來評價各基因型之穩定性的方法中最常用且有效的穩定性介量，但是在實際應用上，不但須滿足一些統計前提，同時，在樣本數少時，其估計值亦容易受離值的影響而造成甚大的變異。基此，本研究即就Nassar及Hühn在1987年所提出的以順位觀點為主之非介量統計分析法的理論，配合Yates和Cochran（1938）之5個大麥品種在6種相異環境下的收量試驗資料作為應用上分析的材料，分別就全部資料及刪除高產區或低產區的離值資料進行分析，並與cv及b之評估結果作一比較，以測試該非介量法用以解釋穩定性問題的可靠性與適用性。
其結果顯示：非介量法較少受統計前提之限制，操作簡便，且增添或刪除一個以上的觀測值也不會造成估計值太大的變異，而其所表達的穩定性意義偏重於生物觀點。cv及b兩種穩定性介量之估計值問存在顯著正相關，但其與非介量穩定性測量值之間則無顯著相關。
Coefficient of variation (cv) and linear regression (b) are useful to evalute the phenotypic stability of genotypes over environments. However, a proper use of these two parametric measures requires some statistical assumptions, and their estimates can be unduly influenced by one or two outliers for small samples. A nonparametric method for stability based on the ranks of genotypes in each environment is proposed by Nassar and Hühn (1987). The purpose of this study is to test the reliability and applicabillity of the nonparametric method by comparing the nonparametric with the parametric stability measures. The comparsion is made using data on 5 genotypes (varieties) of barley in 6 environments (sites) from the yield trials of Yates and Cochran (1938), with and without excluding the highest or lowest yielding site. 
Nonparametric measures requires less statistical assumptions, and are easy to use. Furthermore, addition or deletion of one or a few observations is not as likely to cause great variations in the estimates as would be the case for parametric stability measures. The nonprarmetric measures correspond to a biological concept of stability. The results indicated significant positive correlation between the cv and b, and showed no correlation between nonparametric and parametric stability measures.

metaidentifier: 978-986021860-2,http://ir.tari.gov.tw:8080//handle/345210000/30,http://ir.tari.gov.tw:8080/bitstream/345210000/30/1/49-78 栽培環境調控與植物健康管理.pdf
metarelation: 2009花卉健康管理研討會專刊: 49-78,農業試驗所特刊第143號,Proceedings of the Symposium on Plant Health Management for Flower Crops, p.49-78,Special Publication of TARI No.143,2009花卉健康管理研討會專刊:,49-78
metatitle: 栽培環境調控與植物健康管理,Control of Cultivation Environment and Plant Health Management
metasubject: 環境控制,植物健康管理,作物控制,2009花卉健康管理研討會專刊,Environment control,Plant health management,Crop control,Proceedings of the Symposium on Plant Health Management for Flower Crops
metadescription:
栽培環境調控牽涉範圍廣泛，一般以溫室內生產較容易實際運作，大體而 
言，溫室環境控制包括溫室結構、相關設備與特徵化溫室作物生產之每日管理決 
定。而植物健康管理所揭示「經由揣摩植物本身與週遭之生物、物理與化學條件 
等相關性，藉人為技術之修飾」之意涵，實是溫室環境最佳化管理長期以來追求 
與努力之目標。本文除整理改寫佛羅里達溫室蔬菜生產手冊中有關溫室環境考 
量、溫室環境控制與植物生理之基本內涵與觀念，提供讀者全盤理解，俾利未來 
植物健康管理實踐參考外，亦說明「整合無線區域網路與即時視訊之溫室數位環 
控肥灌系統」之國內環境控制實例。最後並強調「管理光合作用與呼吸作用並藉 
助環控技術進行作物控制」之理念與努力方向，冀望將植物健康管理概念融入現 
代化環境控制系統，以進一步形塑根基於生物資訊之最佳化先進控制技術。 
The scope involved with control of cultivation environment is quite broad, and it 
is more easily implemented in greenhouse production. Environmental control includes 
the greenhouse structure, related equipment, and the day-to-day management 
decisions that characterize greenhouse crop production. The definition of “Plant 
Health Management” partly depicted by“…through fathoming the relationship of 
biological, physical, and chemical conditions between the plant itself and its 
environment as well as modifying by means of artificial technology…” is really the 
long-term pursued and dedicated goal of optimization management of greenhouse 
environment. In addition to rewriting the fundamental contents and concepts 
pertaining to greenhouse environmental design considerations, environmental controls 
and plant physiology, which are discussed in Florida Greenhouse Vegetable 
Production Handbook, this paper also explains a practical example of environment 
control in Taiwan. At last, a philosophy deserved to endeavoring in the future is posed 
to facilitate the “Crop Control” by managing photosynthesis and respiration with 
environmental controls. It is expected that, by combining the concept of plant health 
management into modern environmental control systems, an advanced optimization 
control technology based on biological information could be further set up.

metatitle: 花粉立即效應對寄接梨果實品質之影響
metasubject: 梨,寄接,,果實直感,種子直感,授粉樹,Pyrus pyrifolia Nakai ； annual grafting,metaxenia,xenia,pollenizer
metadescription:
本省梨的栽培面積約有10,000公頃，其中約5,000公頃生産寄接梨，本試驗之目的在於尋求各不同栽培種寄接梨最佳的花粉親種類，以期利用花粉立即效應來改善寄接梨的生産品質。五種高山梨（‘幸水’、‘豐水’、‘新興’、‘新世紀’及‘長十郎’），二種平地梨（‘鳥梨’與‘橫山梨’）及雙品種混合花粉（‘長十郎’＋‘鳥梨’，‘長十郎’＋‘橫山梨’）爲父本與五種母本組成32種人工雜交組合，於1991年與1992年進行兩年試驗。不同花粉親的花粉立即效應非常明顯，可以影響菓實重量、果心大小、種子數目、可溶性固形物及石細胞含量等果實綜合性狀。雙品種混合花粉可提高著果率與產量。,本省梨的栽培面積約有10,000公頃，其中約5,000公頃生産寄接梨，本試驗之目的在於尋求各不同栽培種寄接梨最佳的花粉親種類，以期利用花粉立即效應來改善寄接梨的生産品質。五種高山梨（‘幸水’、‘豐水’、‘新興’、‘新世紀’及‘長十郎’），二種平地梨（‘鳥梨’與‘橫山梨’）及雙品種混合花粉（‘長十郎’＋‘鳥梨’，‘長十郎’＋‘橫山梨’）爲父本與五種母本組成32種人工雜交組合，於1991年與1992年進行兩年試驗。不同花粉親的花粉立即效應非常明顯，可以影響菓實重量、果心大小、種子數目、可溶性固形物及石細胞含量等果實綜合性狀。雙品種混合花粉可提高著果率與產量。
Nash pear is produced on about 10,000 ha of which 5 000 ha are produced by annual grafting fashion in Taiwan. This research attemped to determine the different pollen parents which influence the fruit characteristics of "annual grafting" pears, and to improve fruit quality by immediate pollen effect. Five high-chill adapted cultivars (幸水Kosui, 豐水Hosui, 新興Shinkou, 新世紀Sinseiki, and 長十郎Chojuro), two low chill adapted cuitivars (橫山梨Huang-Sang Li and 鳥梨Niau Li) and two mixed pollen sources (長十郎Chojuro + 鳥梨Ninu Li, and長十郎Chojuro +橫山梨Huang-Sang Li) were paternal parents in controlled crosses with the five maternal parents to make 32 combinations in 1991 and 1992. Pollen source might influence fruit characteristics in relation to fruit weight, fruit size, core size, number of seeds per fruit, total soluble solides and stone cells. Mixed two pollen sources were able to increase fruit setting and total yield.

metacreator: 徐爾烈,吳尹文,楊鈞任,王敦濤,方尚仁
metatitle: 金門及馬祖地區農地鼠形動物之種類、分佈及密度調查
metadescription: 金門縣及連江縣，緊鄰中國大陸，為因應與大陸通航後，大陸地區之鼠形動物可能藉由頻繁的船隻往返而入侵金、馬地區，危害農業作物及倉儲糧食。鼠形動物又為許多人畜共通疾病之宿主如鼠疫、恙蟲病、鼠型斑疹傷寒、漢他病毒等，威脅人民健康。本研究利用捕鼠籠在金、馬地區進行鼠形動物之種類、分佈及季節密度調查，並利用Zippin法評估鼠形動物密度。於金門縣五個鄉鎮設置7個調查點，自2001年7月至11月共放置4102籠夜，捕捉5種鼠形動物389隻，分別為溝鼠（Rattus norvegicus），小黃腹鼠（Rattus losea），屋頂鼠（Rattus rattus），家鼷鼠（Mus musculus）及臭鼩（Suncus murinus），捕捉率為9.5%（389/4102）。根據10月及11月之調查資料以Zippin捕捉去除法推估調查區域內鼠類族群分別為119隻及224隻。於馬祖地區南、北竿兩鄉設置4個調查點，共放置2202籠夜，捕捉5種鼠形動物89隻，分別為溝鼠，小黃腹鼠，田鼷鼠（Mus caroli），家鼷鼠及臭鼩，捕捉率為4.0%（89/2202）。根據10月及11月之調查資料以Zippin捕捉去除法推估鼠形動物分別為30隻及29隻。
